dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.
dependencies.name: libxml2

dependent_to.description:
A presentable text document format for writing articles, UNIX man pages
and other small to medium sized documents.
dependent_to.name: asciidoc

dependent_to.description:
Python 3 port of Asciidoc Python. AsciiDoc is a text document format for
writing notes, documentation, articles, books, ebooks, slideshows, web
pages, man pages and blogs. AsciiDoc files can be translated to many
formats including HTML, PDF, EPUB, man page.
dependent_to.name: asciidoc-py3

dependent_to.description: A C interface to the ZMQ library
dependent_to.name: czmq

dependent_to.description:
D-Bus is a message bus system, a simple way for applications to talk to
one another. D-Bus supplies both a system daemon (for events such new
hardware device printer queue ) and a per-user-login-session daemon (for
general IPC needs among user applications). Also, the message bus is
built on top of a general one-to-one message passing framework, which
can be used by any two applications to communicate directly (without
going through the message bus daemon).
dependent_to.name: dbus

dependent_to.description:
GtkDoc is a tool used to extract API documentation from C-code like
Doxygen, but handles documentation of GObject (including signals and
properties) that makes it very suitable for GTK+ apps and libraries. It
uses docbook for intermediate files and can produce html by default and
pdf/man-pages with some extra work.
dependent_to.name: gtk-doc

dependent_to.description: Libcroco is a standalone css2 parsing and manipulation library.
dependent_to.name: libcroco

dependent_to.description:
A userspace library for accessing the DRM, direct rendering manager, on
Linux, BSD and other systems supporting the ioctl interface.
dependent_to.name: libdrm

dependent_to.description: The ZMQ networking/concurrency library and core API
dependent_to.name: libzmq

dependent_to.description:
Utility xmlto is a simple shell script for converting XML files to
various formats. It serves as easy to use command line frontend to make
fine output without remembering many long options and searching for the
syntax of the backends.
dependent_to.name: xmlto

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
